NAME: ACEDEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive an ACE inhibitor or ARB in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: AFIBINVITE1
DESCRIPTION: Patient has not responded to at least two atrial fibrillation care review invitations, made at least 7 days apart, in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: AFIBPCADEC_DAT
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive atrial fibrillation quality indicator care in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: AFIBPCAPU
DESCRIPTION: Patient for whom atrial fibrillation quality indicator care was unsuitable in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: ALCDEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to have alcohol consumption screening in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date

NAME: AMPR2_DAT
DESCRIPTION: Amputation of right and left foot recorded or congenital abnormality meaning foot examination is not suitable

NAME: ASTDIAGINVITE
DESCRIPTION: Patients who have not responded to at least two asthma care review invitations, made at least 7 days apart, in the period 93 days before and up to 186 days after their earliest unresolved asthma diagnosis.

NAME: ASTINVITE1_DAT
DESCRIPTION: Patients who have not responded to at least two asthma care review invitations, made at least 7 days apart, in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date

NAME: ASTMONDEC_DAT
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive asthma monitoring in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date

NAME: ASTPCADEC_DAT
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive asthma quality indicator care in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: ASTPCAPU_DAT
DESCRIPTION: Patient for whom asthma quality indicator care was unsuitable in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date

NAME: ASTPCASUSP1
DESCRIPTION: Asthma service unavailable in the 6 months after asthma diagnosis or in the 6 months following registration for patients newly diagnosed in 12 months up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: ASTREGINVITE
DESCRIPTION: Patients who have not responded to at least two asthma care review invitations, made at least 7 days apart, up to 186 days after their latest registration date.

NAME: BENGABOP1M
DESCRIPTION: Patient has not been prescribed and dependency causing drugs (benzodiazepine, gabapentinoid, opioid) in the 1 month leading up to the achievement date.

NAME: BGOPCON6M
DESCRIPTION: Patient has been continuously prescribed a dependency causing drug (benzodiazepine, gabapentinoid, opioid) in the 6 month leading up to the quality service start date.

NAME: BLDTESTDEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive a blood test in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: BMIDEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to have their BMI measured in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: BMIPU
DESCRIPTION: Patient for whom BMI measurement was deemed unsuitable in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: BPDEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to have their blood pressure recorded in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date

NAME: BPDEC1
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to have their blood pressure recorded in the 5 years leading up to and including the payment period end date

NAME: CAN_DAT15M
DESCRIPTION: Cancer diagnosis more than 15 months before end of payment period

NAME: CAN_DAT1J
DESCRIPTION: Cancer diagnosis earlier than 1 January prior to the QOF Service Start Date

NAME: CAN_DAT24M
DESCRIPTION: Cancer diagnosis more than 24 months before end of payment period

NAME: CANINVITE
DESCRIPTION: Patient has not responded to at least two cancer care review invitations, made at least 7 days apart, in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: CANPCADEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive cancer quality indicator care in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: CANPCAPU
DESCRIPTION: Patient for whom cancer quality indicator care was unsuitable in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: CANSUP12M
DESCRIPTION: Information about cancer support services available in primary care provided at least 12 months before the payment period end date.

NAME: CHAD_VAL2
DESCRIPTION: Patient's latest CHADS2 or CHA2DS2-VASc stroke risk assessment was recorded at least 12 months prior to the payment period end date and had a score of 2 or more.

NAME: CHADVASC_VAL
DESCRIPTION: Patient’s most recent CHA2DS2-VASc or CHADS2 stroke risk assessment score is less than or equal to 1

NAME: CHDINVITE
DESCRIPTION: Patient has not responded to at least two CHD care review invitations, made at least 7 days apart, in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: CHDINVITEB
DESCRIPTION: Patient has not responded to at least two CHD care review invitations, made at least 7 days apart, in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date, and had no blood pressure recordings, or latest blood pressure reading is above target levels.

NAME: CHDPCADEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive CHD quality indicator care in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: CHDPCAPU
DESCRIPTION: Patient for whom CHD quality indicator care was unsuitable in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: CHDSMOK
DESCRIPTION: Patient does not have any combination of the following conditions: CHD, PAD, stroke or TIA, hypertension, diabetes, COPD, CKD, asthma, schizophrenia, bipolar affective disorder or other psychoses.

NAME: CHOLDEC
DESCRIPTION: Patent chose not to have a cholesterol test in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date

NAME: CHOLMAX
DESCRIPTION: Patient receiving maximum tolerated cholesterol lowering treatment in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: CHRPAIN24M
DESCRIPTION: Patient does not have a diagnosis of chronic pain in the 24 months leading up to the achievement date.

NAME: COPDINVITE
DESCRIPTION: Patient not responded to at least two COPD care review invitations, made at least 7 days apart, in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: COPDPCADEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive COPD quality indicator care in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: COPDPCAPU
DESCRIPTION: Patient for whom COPD quality indicator care was unsuitable in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: CSPCADEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive cervical smear

NAME: CSMOK
DESCRIPTION: Patient does not have a latest smoking status of ‘current smoker’

NAME: CSPCAINVITE
DESCRIPTION: Patient has not responded to three invites for cervical screening.

NAME: CSPU
DESCRIPTION: Cervical screening deemed unsuitable

NAME: CVDHIST
DESCRIPTION: Patient has pre-existing CVD

NAME: CVDNOHIST
DESCRIPTION: Patient does not have pre-existing CVD

NAME: DEMCPDEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive a dementia care plan or chose not to receive a dementia care plan review in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date

NAME: DEMINVITE
DESCRIPTION: Patient has not responded to at least two dementia care review invitations, made at least 7 days apart, in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: DEMPCADEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive dementia quality indicator care in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: DEMPCAPU
DESCRIPTION: Patient for whom dementia quality indicator care was unsuitable in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date

NAME: DEPR_DAT2
DESCRIPTION: Patient has been diagnosed with depression at least 15 months before end of payment period

NAME: DEPRINVITE
DESCRIPTION: Patient has not responded to at least two depression care review invitations, made at least 7 days apart, in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: DEPRPCADEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive depression quality indicator care in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: DEPRPCAPU
DESCRIPTION: Patient for whom depression quality indicator care has been identified as unsuitable for the patient in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: DEPRVW_DAT
DESCRIPTION: Patient had a depression review more than 12 months before end of payment period

NAME: DIAG_DAT13
DESCRIPTION: Patient diagnosed before 01 April 2013

NAME: DIAG_DAT21
DESCRIPTION: Patient diagnosed before 01 April 2021

NAME: DIAG_ECOG
DESCRIPTION: Patient's most recent heart failure diagnosis was within the 6 months leading up to and including the payment period end date and they did not receive an echocardiogram/specialist assessment between 93 days before the date of diagnosis and the payment period end date.

NAME: DIAG_DAT
DESCRIPTION: Patient diagnosed within 3 months of end of payment period

NAME: DIAG_DAT9M
DESCRIPTION: Patient diagnosed within 9 months of end of payment period

NAME: DIAG_ASTTEST
DESCRIPTION: Patient's most recent asthma diagnosis was within the 6 months leading up to and including the payment period end date and they did not receive the required tests between 93 days before the date of diagnosis and the payment period end date.

NAME: DIAGCRV12M
DESCRIPTION: Patient's most recent episode of cancer was within the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date and they did not receive a cancer care review between the date of diagnosis and the payment period end date.

NAME: DIAGCSUP3M
DESCRIPTION: Most recent episode of cancer was within the 3 months leading up to and including the payment period end date and information about cancer support services available in primary care not provided between the date of diagnosis and the payment period end date.

NAME: DM_DAT2
DESCRIPTION: Diagnosis of diabetes mellitus recorded 21 or more months before end of payment period

NAME: DM_DAT3
DESCRIPTION: Diagnosis of diabetes mellitus in the 9 months before end of payment period AND patient has not been referred for diabetes structured education programme

NAME: DM_DAT4
DESCRIPTION: Unresolved diabetes diagnosis recorded at least 12 months before the payment period end date.

NAME: DMBPINVITE
DESCRIPTION: Patient has not responded to at least two diabetes care review invitations, made at least 7 days apart, in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date, and had no blood pressure recordings, or latest blood pressure reading is above target levels.

NAME: DMIFINVITE
DESCRIPTION: Patient has not responded to at least two diabetes care review invitations, made at least 7 days apart, in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date, and had no IFCC-HbA1c recorded, or latest recorded IFCC-HbA1c  is above target levels.

NAME: DMINVITE
DESCRIPTION: Patient has not responded to at least two diabetes care review invitations, made at least 7 days apart, in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: DMMAX
DESCRIPTION: Patient on maximum tolerated diabetes treatment in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: DMPCADEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive diabetes quality indicator care in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: DMPCAPU
DESCRIPTION: Patient for whom diabetes quality indicator care was unsuitable in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: DMTYPE2
DESCRIPTION: Patient's latest diagnosis is type 2 diabetes, and their latest CVD risk score is under 10% with no subsequent score of 10% or over recorded in the 3 years leading up to and including the achievement date.

NAME: DSEP_DAT
DESCRIPTION: Patient referred for diabetes structured education programme more than 12 months before end of payment period

NAME: DSEPDEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to be referred to a diabetes structured education programme in the 279 days following their diabetes diagnosis.

NAME: DSEPPU
DESCRIPTION: Patient for whom a referral to a diabetes structured education programme was unsuitable in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: DSEPSU
DESCRIPTION: Patent for whom a diabetes structured education programme service was unavailable in the 279 days following their diabetes diagnosis.

NAME: DTPCON
DESCRIPTION: Patient had a contraindication to a diphtheria, tetanus and pertussis containing vaccine recorded before they reached 8 months of age

NAME: ECDECSP1
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive an echocardiogram in the 6 months after heart failure diagnosis or in the 6 months following registration for patients newly diagnosed in 12 months up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: ECPCASUSP1
DESCRIPTION: Echocardiography service unavailable in the 6 months after heart failure diagnosis or in the 6 months following registration for patients newly diagnosed in 12 months up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: ECPUSP1
DESCRIPTION: Patient for whom echocardiography was unsuitable in the 6 months after heart failure diagnosis or in the 6 months following registration for patients newly diagnosed in 12 months up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: FEDEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive a foot examination in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: FENOPCASU1
DESCRIPTION: FeNO service unavailable in the 6 months after asthma diagnosis or in the 6 months following registration for patients newly diagnosed in 12 months up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: FEPU
DESCRIPTION: Patient for whom a foot examination was unsuitable in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: GLUCDEC
DESCRIPTION: Patients who chose not to receive a blood glucose test in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: HFDIAGINVITE
DESCRIPTION: Patients who have not responded to at least two heart failure care review invitations, made at least 7 days apart, in the period 93 days before and up to 186 days after their earliest unresolved heart failure diagnosis.

NAME: HFINVITE
DESCRIPTION: Patient has not responded to at least two heart failure care review invitations, made at least 7 days apart, in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date

NAME: HFPCADEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive heart failure quality indicator care in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date

NAME: HFPCAPU
DESCRIPTION: Patient for whom heart failure quality indicator care was unsuitable in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date

NAME: HFPCASUSP1
DESCRIPTION: Heart failure service unavailable in the 6 months after heart failure diagnosis or in the 6 months following registration for patients newly diagnosed in 12 months up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: HFREGINVITE
DESCRIPTION: Patients who have not responded to at least two heart failure care review invitations, made at least 7 days apart, up to 186 days after their latest registration date.

NAME: HSTRK
DESCRIPTION: Patient has had a haemorrhagic stroke up to and including the achievement date.

NAME: HTMAX
DESCRIPTION: Patient receiving maximal blood pressure therapy in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: HYPBPINVITE
DESCRIPTION: Patient has received at least two invitations for hypertension monitoring in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date, and had no blood pressure recordings, or latest blood pressure reading is above target levels.

NAME: HYPPCADEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive hypertension quality indicator care in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date

NAME: HYPPCAPU
DESCRIPTION: Patient for whom hypertension quality indicator care was unsuitable in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date

NAME: IFCCHBA
DESCRIPTION: Patient did not have their IFCC-HbA1c recorded during the current service year but did have serum fructosamine recorded during the service year.

NAME: LBBDEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive beta blockers in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date

NAME: MDRV_DAT
DESCRIPTION: Cancer care review recorded more than 12 months before end of payment period

NAME: MDSEVFRAIL
DESCRIPTION: Patient's latest frailty diagnosis is moderate or severe.

NAME: MEDRVWDEC
DESCRIPTION: Patients who chose not to receive a medication review in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: MHINVITE
DESCRIPTION: Patient has not responded to at least two mental health care review invitations, made at least 7 days apart, in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: MHPCADEC
DESCRIPTION: Patients who chose not to receive mental health quality indicator care in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: MHPCAPU
DESCRIPTION: Patient for whom mental health quality indicator care was unsuitable in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: MHREM_DAT
DESCRIPTION: Patient in remission

NAME: MMRCON
DESCRIPTION: Patient contraindicated to the MMR vaccine up to and including the date the patient attained 18 months of age

NAME: MMRDTAPCON
DESCRIPTION: Patient met any of the following criteria before 5th birthday: both MMR and DTaP/IPV contraindicated; received 2 doses of MMR but  DTaP/IPV contraindicated; received a reinforcing dose of DTaP/IPV, but  MMR vaccine contraindicated

NAME: MRC1
DESCRIPTION: Patient has not had a Medical Research Council (MRC) breathlessness scale score of >3 in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: NDHINVITE
DESCRIPTION: Patient has not responded to at least two non-diabetic hyperglycaemia  care review invitations, made at least 7 days apart, in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: NDHPCADEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive non diabetic hyperglycaemia  quality indicator care in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: NDHPU
DESCRIPTION: Patient for whom non diabetic hyperglycaemia  quality indicator care was unsuitable in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: NOCX
DESCRIPTION: Patient has had a complete removal of the cervix.

NAME: NPTDEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive neuropathy testing in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: NPTPU
DESCRIPTION: Patient for whom neuropathy testing was unsuitable in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date

NAME: ORANTICOAGDEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive an oral anticoagulant in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: OSTREXCL
DESCRIPTION: Patient does not have a non-haemorrhagic stroke or a TIA diagnosis up to and including the achievement date.

NAME: P_AGE25_49
DESCRIPTION: Patient age is less than 25 years or greater than 49 years

NAME: P_AGE50_64
DESCRIPTION: Patient age is less than 50 years or greater than 64 years

NAME: PALCARE
DESCRIPTION: Patients who have a palliative care code recorded between 1 April 2008 and up to and including the achievement date and have not been subsequently identified as no longer requiring palliative care.

NAME: PAT_AGEO19
DESCRIPTION: Patient age is over 19 years

NAME: PAT_AGEO79
DESCRIPTION: Patient age is over 79 years

NAME: PAT_AGEU39
DESCRIPTION: Patient age is 39 years or less

NAME: PAT_AGEU45
DESCRIPTION: Patient age is under 45 years

NAME: PAT_AGEU80
DESCRIPTION: Patient age is under 80 years

NAME: PREG_DAT
DESCRIPTION: Patients who were pregnant in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: PRT_COD
DESCRIPTION: No proteinuria or microalbuminuria codes recorded

NAME: PULRHBATT
DESCRIPTION: Patient has attended pulmonary rehabilitation at any point between date of diagnosis and prior to an MRC breathlessness scale score of >3 up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: PULRHBDEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to be referred to a pulmonary rehabilitation service in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: PULRHBPU
DESCRIPTION: Patient for whom pulmonary rehabilitation was unsuitable in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: PULRHBSU
DESCRIPTION: COPD service or pulmonary rehabilitation service unavailable in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: QIDPCADEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to be referred for social prescribing within the quality service period.

NAME: QIDPCAPU
DESCRIPTION: Patient was referred to social prescribing prior to the quality service start date.

NAME: RAINVITE
DESCRIPTION: Patient has not responded to at least two rheumatoid arthritis care review invitations, made at least 7 days apart, in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: RAPCADEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive rheumatoid arthritis quality indicator care in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: RAPCAPU
DESCRIPTION: Patients for whom rheumatoid arthritis quality indicator care was unsuitable in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: REG_ECOG
DESCRIPTION: Patients with an existing unresolved heart failure diagnosis whose most recent registration was within the 6 months leading up to and including the payment period end date and they did not receive an echocardiogram/specialist between 93 days before the date of registration and the payment period end date.

NAME: REG_DAT3
DESCRIPTION: Patient registered within 3 months of end of payment period

NAME: REG_DAT9
DESCRIPTION: Patient registered within 9 months of end of payment period

NAME: REG_ASTTEST
DESCRIPTION: Patients with an existing unresolved asthma diagnosis whose most recent registration was within the 6 months leading up to and including the payment period end date and they did not receive the required tests between 93 days before the date of registration and the payment period end date.

NAME: SALDEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive salicylates, oral anticoagulants and clopidogrel in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: SALDIPDEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive salicylates, oral anticoagulants, clopidogrel and dipyridamole in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: SHCON
DESCRIPTION: Patient contraindicated to a shingles vaccine up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: SHDECU80
DESCRIPTION: Patient met both of the following criteria whilst they were aged at least 70 years and less than 80 years of age: had not received any shingles vaccine doses; chose not to receive a shingles vaccination.

NAME: SHDECV2
DESCRIPTION: Patient received first dose of a two-dose shingles vaccine whilst they were aged at least 70 years and less than 80 years of age, and then chose not to receive a second dose up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: SHNOV2O80
DESCRIPTION: Patient turned 80 years old during the service year and received the first dose of a two-dose shingles vaccination but had not received their second dose up to and including the payment period end date

NAME: SHV2AGE
DESCRIPTION: Patient is not in the age 80-81 years (inclusive) age bracket at the payment period end date and is not awaiting a completing dose of a two dose course of shingles vaccine.

NAME: SMOKINVITE
DESCRIPTION: Patient has not responded to at least two smoking care review invitations, made at least 7 days apart, in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: SMOKPCADEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive smoking quality indicator care in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: SMOKPCAPU
DESCRIPTION: Patient for whom smoking quality indicator care was unsuitable in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: SMOKSTATDEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to disclose their smoking status in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: SPIRDECSP1
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive spirometry in the 6 months after asthma diagnosis or in the 6 months following registration for patients newly diagnosed in 12 months up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: SPIRPCASUSP1
DESCRIPTION: Spirometry service unavailable in the 6 months after asthma diagnosis or in the 6 months following registration for patients newly diagnosed in 12 months up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: SPIRPUSP1
DESCRIPTION: Patient for whom spirometry was unsuitable in the 6 months after asthma diagnosis or in the 6 months following registration for patients newly diagnosed in 12 months up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: STATINDEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive a statin prescription in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: STBPINVITE
DESCRIPTION: Patient received two invitations for stroke monitoring and had no blood pressure recordings during the 12 months leading up to and including the achievement date, or latest blood pressure reading is above target levels.

NAME: STIAINVITE
DESCRIPTION: Patient has not responded to at least two stroke care review invitations, made at least 7 days apart, in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: STIAPCADEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient chose not to receive stroke quality indicator care in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: STIAPCAPU
DESCRIPTION: Patient for whom stroke quality indicator care was unsuitable in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date

NAME: TXLBB
DESCRIPTION: Patient has an expiring contraindication to licensed beta-blockers recorded in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: TXORANTICOAG_DAT
DESCRIPTION: Patient has an expiring oral anticoagulant contraindication recorded in the last 12 months.

NAME: TXSTAT
DESCRIPTION: Patient has an expiring statin contraindication recorded in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: ULBB_DAT
DESCRIPTION: Unlicensed Beta Blocker prescribed is within 6 months of Heart Failure diagnosis

NAME: XACE
DESCRIPTION: Patient has a persisting ACE-I contraindication or an expiring ACE-I contraindication, and the patient has a persisting ARB contraindication or an expiring ARB contraindication, in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: XACEARBDEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient has a persisting ACE-I contraindication or an expiring ACE-I contraindication or has chosen not to receive an ACE-I, and the patient has a persisting ARB contraindication or an expiring ARB contraindication or has chosen not to receive an ARB, in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: XCLO_CODC
DESCRIPTION: Patient has persisting Salicylate, oral anticoagulant or Clopidogrel contraindications recorded or expiring Salicylate, oral anticoagulant  or Clopidogrel contraindications recorded in the 12 months before end of payment period

NAME: XLBB
DESCRIPTION: Patient has a persisting contraindication to licensed beta-blockers recorded.

NAME: XOANTC_COD
DESCRIPTION: Patient has persisting anticoagulant contraindications recorded anywhere in their record

NAME: XSAL
DESCRIPTION: Patient has persisting salicylate, oral anticoagulant or clopidogrel contraindications recorded or expiring salicylate, oral anticoagulant  or clopidogrel contraindications recorded in the 12 months before end of payment period or chose not to receive salicylate, oral anticoagulant or clopidogrel in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date

NAME: XSALCONTRA
DESCRIPTION: Patient has persisting salicylate, oral anticoagulant, clopidogrel or dipyridamole contraindications recorded or expiring salicylate, oral anticoagulant, clopidogrel or dipyridamole contraindications recorded in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date

NAME: XSALDIPDEC
DESCRIPTION: Patient has persisting salicylate, oral anticoagulant, clopidogrel or dipyridamole contraindications recorded or expiring salicylate, oral anticoagulant, clopidogrel or dipyridamole contraindications recorded in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date or chose not to receive salicylate, oral anticoagulant, clopidogrel or dipyridamole in the 12 months leading up to and including the payment period end date.

NAME: XSTAT
DESCRIPTION: Patient has persisting statin contraindication anywhere in the patient record.
